legend.ðŸŸ¢: REQUIRED - Essential for the backup script to work
legend.ðŸ”´: NOT NEEDED - Skip entirely for security

account_permissions.description: View and manage users blocked by the user.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we only need to read starred repositories, not manage user blocking

account_permissions.description: Manage Codespaces user secrets.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't use GitHub Codespaces functionality

account_permissions.description: This application will receive your GitHub ID, your GitHub Copilot Chat session messages (not including messages sent to another application), and timestamps of provided GitHub Copilot Chat session messages. This permission must be enabled for Copilot Extensions.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't interact with Copilot Chat functionality

account_permissions.description: This application will receive bits of Editor Context (e.g. currently opened file) whenever you send it a message through Copilot Chat.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't use Copilot Editor Context

account_permissions.description: Send Copilot requests.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't send Copilot requests

account_permissions.description: Manage a user's email addresses.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we only need repository data, not user email information

account_permissions.description: View events triggered by a user's activity.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't need to track user activity events

account_permissions.description: A user's followers
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we only need starred repositories, not follower information

account_permissions.description: View and manage a user's GPG keys.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't need to access or manage GPG keys

account_permissions.description: Create and modify a user's gists and comments.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we're backing up repositories, not gists

account_permissions.description: Git SSH keys
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we use HTTPS cloning, not SSH keys

account_permissions.description: Interaction limits on repositories
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't need to manage repository interaction limits

account_permissions.description: View knowledge bases for a user.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we're backing up repositories, not knowledge bases

account_permissions.description: Allows access to GitHub Models.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't use GitHub Models functionality

account_permissions.description: View a user's plan.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't need to access user plan information

account_permissions.description: View a user's invitations to private repositories
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we're only backing up public starred repositories

account_permissions.description: Manage a user's profile settings.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't need to access or modify user profile settings

account_permissions.description: View and manage a user's SSH signing keys.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we don't need to access SSH signing keys

account_permissions.description: List and manage repositories a user is starring.
account_permissions.justification: CRITICAL - This is the core functionality needed to fetch target user's starred repositories list. Essential for the backup script to work.

account_permissions.description: List and change repositories a user is subscribed to.
account_permissions.justification: Not needed for backup script - we need starred repositories, not watched repositories

summary.security_principle: Minimum required permissions for maximum security - only enable Starring (Read) permission
summary.note: Repository access is controlled separately when creating the token - select 'Public repositories (read-only)'
